page.title: 09Religion.
page.content: David Guest is the Rector. Also looks after 3 other churches. Typical Tues- day morning: Rises 7am. Says morning prayers in Church; breakfast; conducts School Assembly & teaches older children; returns to Rectory for study -Afternoon visits sick, elderly etc; 5 pm. evening prayer in Church. Evening- meetings. Congregations-Sunday approx 35 -40. Choir- 6 adults, 7 children. Rector plays the organ. Favourite Hymn -'Dear Lord and Master of Mankind'. Church roof is being repaired. Cost- about Â£70,ooo. Contractors: Calverts of Leyburn & Shouksmiths of Leeds. Interesting features in Middleham Church: Medieval window of St. Alkelda and mod' window of Richard 111. Charles Kingsley_ a previous Rector. Church attracts many visitors. Church heating approx Â£1000 p.a. Footpath relaid 1985 by Manpower Services.
